title: Group of 20 T206 HOF and SL Beaters **Price drop on last 2**

posts.post_title: Group of 20 T206 HOF and SL Beaters **Price drop on last 2**
posts.post_content:
Here is a group of 20 T206 Hall of Fame and Southern League cards.  All are obviously low grade and have major condition issues such as trimming, paper loss/damage, heavy creasing, etc.  Prices are listed individually and all prices are delivered.   PRICE DROP ON FINAL 2 CARDS.  Any method of payment is fine.  Please e-mail me at [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] or send me a PM to reserve any cards.  Thanks for looking.
